content.raw:
Initial step on pull request #146: unify all emitters into one.

That PR still relies on a global emitter, and two pieces of code need it to be global: 

1. the jquery code which runs on document load 
1. the angular code running in the global scope

Moving the jquery code into `GZ3D.Gui` is straightforward, but angular will need more attention.

That PR still relies on a global emitter, and two pieces of code need it to be global:

  1. the jquery code which runs on document load
  2. the angular code running in the global scope

Moving the jquery code into GZ3D.Gui is straightforward, but angular will need more attention.
